name: Enlightment (Veomix)
description:
Enlight!
Discover the futuristic city like never before. Help the city by leading the power throughout the city. This is no simple task though, by the power getting blocked to using stategy to allign the laser. Can you help the city?

  • Use the sattelite dishes to lead the light
  • Reach the end spotlight

Controls:

  • Left to click interact with the objects

Sounds:

  • Sfx : zapsplat.com
  • Music: Mike Noise - Low Earth Orbit
